title: JCO and I - primary purpose of the questions

content.question: The primary purpose of the questions in Paragraph 6 is to

choices.label: reveal the author's confusion about how people view her
explore the author's feelings of suspicion and rejection
question the extent to which anyone can understand the thoughts of another
reinforce the author's position that art functions independently of individuals

content.answer: reinforce the author's position that art functions independently of individuals

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
